packages_section.title: Our Packages
packages_section.subtitle: Find the perfect formula for your event

laPetiteKoki.title: La petite Koki
laPetiteKoki.description: Ideal for small events up to 50 people
laPetiteKoki.heroDescription: Perfect for birthdays, daycare graduations, or family festivals, this package brings fun, laughter, and delicious smoothies to any celebration!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This package includes a kid-friendly blender bike, allowing participants to pedal to create their smoothies, making it a fun and interactive activity for all ages. We can customize this package with your branding, balloons, and custom decorations!
includes: 1 kid-friendly blender bike (5-10 years) - they pedal, they mix, they have fun!
Fresh and colorful smoothies - made on-site with joy and energy
Lively animation - music and festive atmosphere everyone will remember
Possible customization with your brand, balloons, and decorations
Blended by your kids, powered by fun!

options.title: Option 1
options.idealFor: Perfect for small birthday parties or intimate events.
includes: 25 delicious smoothies + 1 hour of energetic entertainment

options.title: Option 2
options.idealFor: Ideal for larger parties, daycare graduations, or family festivals.
includes: 50 delicious smoothies + 2 hours of energetic entertainment

popSolo.title: Pop Solo
popSolo.tagline: A guaranteed success with teens, adults, and families!
popSolo.heroDescription: Perfect for school events, office parties, or any festive gathering focused on health and fun!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This package includes an adult-sized blender bike, allowing participants to create their fresh smoothies while exercising. A perfect experience that combines fun, health, and social interaction. We can customize this package with your branding, balloons, and decorations!
includes: Festive atmosphere with music and good vibes
Blended by you, powered by fun!

options.title: Option 1

includes: Festive atmosphere with music and good vibes

options.title: Option 2

doubleFun.title: Double Fun
doubleFun.description: Two bikes for more fun and competition
doubleFun.tagline: Twice the bikes = twice the energy!
doubleFun.heroDescription: Perfect for community festivals, brand activations, fundraisers, corporate parties, open houses, and more!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This package includes two adult-sized blender bikes, enabling a larger-scale interactive experience. Perfect for creating a dynamic crowd atmosphere and engaging more participants simultaneously. You can customize this package with your branding, balloons, and decorations - let us know to triple the fun!
includes: Complete setup with tables and signage
Customization with your branding, balloons, and decorations

readySetBlend.title: Ready Set Blend
readySetBlend.description: For large events with many participants
readySetBlend.tagline: Team-building with a touch of health and energy!
readySetBlend.heroDescription: Perfect for corporate events, festive gatherings, conferences, wellness challenges, and fun fundraisers!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This package transforms smoothie creation into a friendly competition! With two blender bikes, speed monitors, and a real-time scoreboard, your participants will experience a unique and motivating team-building experience. Make your event unforgettable with friendly competition and delicious rewards.
includes: Energetic host to encourage the crowd
Smoothies prepared with your own pedaling energy

parentChildChallenge.title: Parent-Child Challenge
details: 2 smoothie bikes (1 standard, 1 adapted for children)
parentChildChallenge.tagline: A family challenge they won't forget!
parentChildChallenge.heroDescription: Perfect for schools, festivals, family parties, or neighborhood events that want to bring generations together.

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This unique package combines a child-friendly bike and an adult bike, creating an intergenerational experience where parents and children collaborate in a friendly competition full of laughter and bonding. Bonding, laughter, and delicious smoothies - all in one!
includes: Moments of bonding, laughter, and delicious smoothies in a single event!

options.title: Option 1
options.idealFor: Perfect for small family events and intimate celebrations.

options.title: Option 2
options.idealFor: Ideal for family festivals and large community events.
includes: 100 smoothies + 3 hours of energy and fun

smoothieParade.title: The Smoothie Parade
smoothieParade.description: For festivals and large public events
details: Unlimited smoothies for the duration of the event
Variety of ingredients and special recipes
smoothieParade.tagline: Perfect for large crowds and even more fun!
smoothieParade.heroDescription: This festive package includes 2 large blender bikes and 1 small one (for children 6 years and older), perfect for events that call for excitement, colors, and community. Let your guests pedal to create delicious smoothies with our interactive installation!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: Our most spectacular package! With three blender bikes (2 large + 1 small), this installation creates a true attraction that captivates and engages crowds for hours. Perfect for large-scale events that want to make an impression. Bring the energy. Blend the fun.
includes: The Smoothie Parade is your solution for unforgettable group experiences - indoor or outdoor!

options.title: Standard Installation
options.idealFor: Perfect for medium festivals and community events.

signature.title: Signature Package
details: Number of bikes according to your needs
signature.tagline: Add your flavor to the fun!
signature.heroDescription: Make your event stand out with our Signature Event Branding package. Transform any event into a unique and memorable experience with Voilà Vélo!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: Whether it's a corporate event, brand activation, or personal celebration, we offer customized personalization options to showcase your identity - smoothie style! Contact us to make your event unique!

options.title: Custom Signature Package
options.idealFor: Perfect for all types of events requiring complete customization.

pageHero.title: Our Packages
pageHero.description: Festivals, corporate events, fundraisers, or school programs - we have the perfect package for you.

intro.description1: Our smoothie bikes are available for rental throughout the region. Whether you're organizing a small family event or a large festival, we have a solution tailored to your needs.
intro.description2: All our packages include delivery, setup and breakdown, as well as a professional host to guide your guests through the experience. We also provide all the fresh ingredients, cups, and other accessories needed.

packagesGrid.title: Discover our packages
packagesGrid.subtitle: A unique and memorable experience for all types of events

help.title: Need help choosing?
help.description: Our team can help you select the perfect package for your event or create a completely customized solution.

testimonial.text: We booked Voilà Vélo Fruité for our corporate day and it was a resounding success! The team was professional and our employees loved the experience.
testimonial.author: Marie Lemieux

testimonial.text: Our experience with {packageTitle} was absolutely amazing! Our guests loved the interactivity and the smoothies were delicious.
